snippet: The amount of student loans that are delinquent has remained constant or increased at a time when delinquencies on mortgages and other types of consumer credit have declined.
lead_paragraph: The amount of student loans that are delinquent has remained constant or increased at a time when delinquencies on mortgages and other types of consumer credit have declined.

headline.seo: Bad Student Debt High as Collection Efforts Surge
headline.main: Bad Student Debt Stubbornly High as Collection Efforts Surge
